short_summary: Transport Canada will be provide Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Programmer Analysts and Business System Analyst to support multiple business units. The value is not especificated.
description: Transport Canada needs ERP Programmer Analysts and Business System Analyst to develop handheld and web-based applications using application architecture specifications and requirements according to TC's System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) standards and security guidelines.
full_summary:
**Professional Services to Support Microsoft Power Platform**
==============================================

### Solicitation Details

* **Title**: Professional Services to Support Microsoft Power Platform
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01031106
* **Amendment Number**: 6
* **Solicitation Number**: T8080-220407
* **Publication Date**: March 30, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 1, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date**: April 26, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: May 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 29, 2025
* **Tender Status**: Expired

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Tony Youness
* **Email Address**: [tony.youness@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tony.youness@tc.gc.ca)
* **Phone Number**: (613) 999-9999

### Trade Agreements

* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**
* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)**
* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)**
* **Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)**
* **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)**
* **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement**
* **Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)**

### Regions of Opportunity

* **National Capital Region (NCR)**

### Contract Requirements

* **Transport Canada (TC) requires the services of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Programmer Analysts and Business System Analysts (BSA)**
* **Tasks are centered on development of handheld and web-based applications utilizing application architecture specifications and requirements according to TC's System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) standards and security guidelines**
* **The Power Apps solutions will support multiple TC business units and leverage common Power Apps, Power Automate, and Power BI entities, workflows, and corresponding models to support TC legislated priorities**

### Contract Duration

* **Up to two (2) contracts, each for one year plus two (2) one-year irrevocable options**

### Security Requirements

* **Common PS SIN #19 applies**
* **Minimum corporate security required: Facility Security Clearance**
* **Minimum resource security required: Secret**

### Tender Description

Transport Canada has
